title: What is direct vent technology on the Heat n Glo website? - Quora

response.answer_text: As this name is associated with a variety of fireplace, I’m going to assume that’s what we’re talking about here. Direct venting describes where any exhaust is conducted only a short distance to vents on the outside of a structure, rather than through an elaborate chimney or long ducts. That said, there are still regulations in play, such as (1) the exit vent must be at least a minimum distance away from any air intakes, (2) the exit vent must be more than a certain distance off the ground, (3) it must be properly insulated from any building materials, (4) it must be beyond the reach of children. I’m sure there are others.
